title: Game Progress Route
content:
ulet (X: -626, Y: 224), talk to it, start Help the Cursed Monk quest. Pull lava valve, fight Grym, get Grymskull Helm, earn 500 XP. Return to Stonemason Kith, path behind him. Descend cliff, History check reveals Harper rune. Find chests, Toy Chest (X: -699 Y: 375), ambush by three Mimics.

Defeat Mimics, get Gold, Scroll of Evidence. Climb up Cragged rock, take stairs up next to you, past camp, reach large area.

Baldur's Gate 3 Act 2 Game Progress Route Quick Navigation
